code:
// src/reducers/index.js
var INITIAL_STATE={counter:0};function clickReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADD_CLICK':return{counter:state.counter+1};default:return state;}}export default clickReducer;
